document_data.mainbody:
nja was a woman from the Wandering Village that traveled Icewind Dale between the Ten Towns and Kuldahar on the Spine of the World in the early 14 century DR.
Circa the , beautiful Anja was in love with hapless young hunter Jari. But the hunter was not the only man who clamor for Anjas hand, and her father decided that the suitors needed to compete for affection. Jari was a bad hunter and contemplated to run with Anja away from the Wandering Village.
